mapper.sql: id, menu_type, title, icon, type, path, sort, status, parent_id, remark
mapper.insert: insert into app_menu (menu_type, title, icon, type, path, sort, status, parent_id, remark) values (#{menuType}, #{title}, #{icon}, #{type}, #{path}, #{sort}, #{status}, #{parentId}, #{remark})
mapper.delete: delete from app_menu where id in #{id}
mapper.update: update app_menu set status = #{status} where id = #{id}
